description.value:
Wondrous item, very rare
This golden pocketwatch has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at midnight. While holding it, you can use an action to wind it and expend 1 charge to cast the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.aHifQ78fmPqA4oAJ]{haste} spell from it.
If the pendant is destroyed (AC 14, 15 hit points) while it has 3 charges, the creature that broke it gains the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.OmliPGJq1cRGCFpr]{time stop} spell.
